title: Project Management Web Application
description: Developed Scrum Guide to organize tasks by status (To Do, In Progress, Done), optimizing project management and team collaboration.

title: Restaurant Recommendation Website
description: Created an interactive website with a favorite management system and visit tracking.Integrated an API, a secure authentication system, and a map mode for better user experience.

title: Software Design Project
description: Designed a software solution for chalets with features such as STL export, undo/redo, and accessory management.Implemented design patterns like Factory and Strategy to improve software architecture.
